Text.Language: P[oic Vnou] n~te nijom: kotk ouoh joust e~bolqen t~ve: a~nau ouoh jemp~sini n~taibw n~a~loli: cebtwtc ouoh cemn/tc yai e~tac[oc n~je tekouinam.
O Lord, God of hosts, return and behold from heaven, and look and visit this vine, restore and establish Her, this which Your right hand has planted.

Marenhwc nem niaggeloc nem nitagma n~e~pouranin e~te vai pe Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip~neuma eyouab.
Let us praise with the angels and the heavenly hosts He who is the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit.

Maria ][rompi eynecwc: Maria ]yeo~tokoc: Maria y~mau n~I/couc Pi,~rictoc: vwk pe piw~ou nem pia~mahi.
Mary the beautiful dove, Mary the Theotokos, Mary the Mother of Jesus Christ, to you is the glory and majesty.
